name: obsidian-hoarder
description: Sync your Hoarder bookmarks with Obsidian

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.install-plugin: npm run build && mkdir -p "${OBSIDIAN_VAULT:-$HOME/Documents/github/notes}/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-hoarder" && cp -r dist/* "${OBSIDIAN_VAULT:-$HOME/Documents/github/notes}/.obsidian/plugins/obsidian-hoarder/"

author: Jordan Hofker <jhofker@gmail.com>
